blogPost.excerpt: Keeping up with Slack channels demands your attention and time! Let Grok do the comprehending with the power of GPT-3. Summarize any Slack Channel on-demand, in a daily digest, or when joining a channel.
blogPost.body: Keeping up with Slack channels demands your attention and time! Let Grok do the comprehending with the power of GPT-3. Summarize any Slack Channel on-demand, in a daily digest, or when joining a channel.
blogPost.title: Grok - Summarize Slack channels w/ GPT3
blogPost.author: Tristan Pollock

localize.description: 保持对Slack频道的关注，需要您的注意力和时间！让Grok利用GPT-3的强大功能进行理解。让Grok利用GPT-3的强大功能进行理解。按需、在每日摘要中或在加入频道时对任何 Slack 频道进行总结。
